summary: This is a calendar entry for the start of Ghislaine Maxwell's criminal trial, scheduled to begin on July 12, 2021, before Judge Nathan in the Southern District of New York. It includes scheduling details and an alarm reminder.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The document is a calendar entry for the start of her criminal trial, referred to as the 'Maxwell Jury Trial'.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: The trial is scheduled to take place in the courtroom of Judge Nathan.

events.title: Maxwell Jury Trial Start
events.description: The scheduled start date for the criminal trial of Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's criminal trial was scheduled to begin on July 12, 2021.
The trial was to be held before Judge Nathan in the Southern District of New York.
The calendar entry was created on July 14, 2020, and modified on May 11, 2021.
